page.title: 12CLYST HONITON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {CLYST HONITON CHURCH OF {ENGLAND PRIMARY SCHOOL} The oldest building in the school is the class for the older ones.It was opened in 1872 and now has 25 pupils aged 7 to 11.The wooden classroom was opened in 1969.It has 22 infant pupils. We have a school field in which there are climbing frames.In it there is a little bar and a big bar.The big bar is usually used by the older ones. The little bar is played on by everyone.School starts at 9.00.a.m. and ends at 3.30.p.m.There used to be three classes but a teacher left as the number of pupils fell. Every year we go for a trip with the school.Each Thursday we have a C.O.S.S.day with two other schools, when we travel to one of the three schools and work together for the day.
